titleStmt.title: By the Major. Whereas by severall orders of the House of Commons in Parliament assembled, and by a letter to the the speaker of that House, from the Committee of the countie of York, this day delivered to the Common-councell by a committee of the said House of Commons, it is declared, that the Parliaments army in the northern parts are in a sad and distressed condition for want of food and other necessaries; ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor.
Warner, John, Sir, d. 1648.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes Printer to the honorable City of London,

notesStmt.note: Collection of arrears for the army; dated at end: 29. day of August, 1648.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
